name: TRANSCEND
description: In this unique 2D world, you will partake in the story of a "Spirit Warrior" who is seeking to become THE Greatest Warrior ever. In order for him to fulfill his destiny he will 'transcend' time, worlds and even dimensions, to test himself against the strongest warriors to ever live...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2.4ghz CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 47 MB available space Additional Notes: Will run on most low-end PCs
